Seven fully customizable coins 7 metal coins with free choice of metal and multiplier for each coin. Create your own assortment according to your precise needs. Contents: 7 customizable metal coins Each coin: metal AND multiplier choice Available metals: copper, silver, electrum, gold, platinum Multipliers: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 Compose your exact treasure according to your game needs!
